author: wadalliance
title: Wada Preserving Culture: NFT -> DAO
description: Digital services for Intellectual Property are not available to Indigenous Communities, excluding them from fair and legal representation.
solution: Create a NFT-based model for Intellectual Property rights that will integrate into WadaDAO Preserving Culture on Cardano Blockchain.
experience: Fund 6 Funded Proposal 'Preserving Culture', Wada team and partners working on creating DAOs, developers and legal counsel available.
